description: This header file provides utility functions for file content reading, property extraction, file existence checks, recursive file searching, and variable expansion within strings, mainly used for configuration and file management tasks.

methods.name: bool readPropertyFromFile(const char * filename,const string & property,string & propertyValue)
methods.description: Reads a property value from a given file, supporting recursive expansion if the value starts with '$'.

methods.description: Reads the entire content of a specified file into a string.

methods.name: bool isRegularFile(const string & path)
methods.description: Checks if a given path corresponds to a regular file.

methods.name: bool searchFilesRec(std::vector<std::string> & pathList,unsigned int currentDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Recursively searches for files matching a pattern within directories, with support for exclusions and result cap.

methods.name: bool searchFiles(string & inputPath,int maxDepth,int minDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Initiates a recursive file search from a starting path with depth options and exclusions.

methods.name: bool ExpandPropertiesInString(const char * input,const char * filePath,string & expandedString)
methods.description: Expands variables embedded in a string by reading their values from a property file.
